name: The Oneironaut
description:
This is The Oneironaut, a rouge-like dungeon crawler. We, Stephen Clarke and Graham Hughes, are currently Sacred Heart University game design students who created this project as a capstone. This is an in depth prototype of our final idea, so any testing would be greatly appreciated. We also have a survey for anyone willing to complete that would really help us develop the prototype and let us know if you all would like to see it become a reality.

  Here is the link to the survey: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1sQokuNM3HeCLZVKqcey91dFi9zWQ4qhOjbWo97tix6U/edit?usp=drive_web.

Thank you to all who have supported our journey in making this game, friends and faculty. We will be sure to include all of you in the credits when we make them!
